Content.summary: 'Umbraco backup available for purchase' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson written on 07 August 2006
Content.bodyText:
Although Umbraco backup is still in beta, I've opened up the buy now link as the code that takes the backup is stable and backups will be compatible with future releases. You will need to register first.

I anticipate finishing FTP and Virtual directory support later tonight. Restore tools and the manual should follow by the end of the week.

Start backing up today!
